DOC.detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE : This randomize , placebo control study . Patients stratify accord prestudy homocysteine level ( average ) . Patients randomize receive placebo one two dose oral folic acid , without pyridoxine cyanocobalamin . Arm I : Patients receive oral placebo daily . Arm II : Patients receive oral pyridoxine , cyanocobalamin , oral placebo daily . Arm III : Patients receive oral pyridoxine , cyanocobalamin , folic acid daily . Arm IV : Patients receive oral pyridoxine cyanocobalamin plus high dose folic acid daily . Arm V : Patients receive oral placebo oral folic acid daily . Arm VI : Patients receive oral placebo high dose folic acid daily . Treatment continue 8 week . Completion date provide represent completion date grant per OOPD record
